law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4224a-3, 4224a-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: When licenses to be obtained; when to expire; proportional rate; additional fee for prior operation without license.
